channel.title: Starblaster100
channel.description:
Hello, Mopar Community Members. I felt that I should inform you that StarBlaster100 has been de-adminned on SRL-Forums. According to our Admin Panel information. He did the following: He made a shadow account, which he gave access masks to view [b]ALL[/b] forums and sub-forums on SRL. (Admin Forums, Developers Forums, et cetera) With this shadow account, named [b]Daniel.Blaze[/b], he tried to split up the SRL-Community and flame on SRL-staff members. You can find the public thread that WT-Fakawi made, here: http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/starblaster100-no-longer-t37613.html And everyone who is an SRL-Member can find the thread were Starblaster (Daniel.Blaze) flamed, here: http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/would-you-do-t37476.html Some of this seems to be done a [b]LONG[/b] time ago. We never noticed it before. Some logs and IP's:
37976 Starblaster100 12:29, 3rd Sep 2007 accessmask.php modify 80.254.147.52
[QUOTE] * Daniel.Blaze 128.243.253.113 * Snowflake 128.243.253.113 * Starblaster100 128.243.253.113 [/QUOTE] [QUOTE] * Daniel.Blaze 212.85.5.19 * Starblaster100 212.85.5.19 [/QUOTE] [QUOTE] * Daniel.Blaze 80.254.147.52 * Starblaster100 80.254.147.52 [/QUOTE] [QUOTE] * Daniel.Blaze 84.66.125.218 * Starblaster100 84.66.125.218 [/QUOTE] [QUOTE] * Boreas 91.104.162.222 * Daniel.Blaze 91.104.162.222 * Starblaster100 91.104.162.222 [/QUOTE] I am pretty confident this is Starblaster and I am very confident Boreas has nothing to do with this. Boreas once lent his account to StarBlaster100 so he could do some admin stuff which he on his own account could not. Daniel.Blaze account info: Referrer: "StarBlaster100". Email: Daniel.Blaze.[B]100[/B]@googlemail.com The 'Current users viewing this thread' feature also disappeared some time ago, too. Maybe because Daniel.Blaze could not be made invisible? That would certainly draw too much attention. [QUOTE] * Daniel.Blaze [B]80.254.147.52 [/B] * Starblaster100 [B]80.254.147.52 [/B][/quote]
37976 Starblaster100 12:29, 3rd Sep 2007 accessmask.php modify [B]80.254.147.52[/B]
This is the only time StarBlaster100 ever entered accessmasks.php. The non existing Daniel.Blaze did NOT hack StarBlaster100. This really is StarBlaster's own doing. Also, please note... If you feel that we made a mistake, please don't hesitate to defend StarBlaster and post here. It all seemed very unlikely at the start, but there now is so much evidence the SRL-Staff team could only draw one conclusion from the evidence: This really is StarBlaster100's doing, and his intention was to damage SRL's morale. Five (totally different) IP Matches, the Access masks were set on one of those give IP's, and the way Daniel.Blaze behaved is very much like Starblaster100's behavior when he was upset. It all sums up. We also heard that he recently was very upset because Hobbit became an admin. And Daniel.Blaze heavily flamed Hobbit in some threads. Thank you for your time.

item.title: Starblaster100
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Ollie:

Ron, dont start talking shit, no-one likes you.

All I said was “Interesting. I know what type of person you are now.”

Tree:

He gained his position from helping a few idiots in the SCAR section. It’s expected that he talks complete garbage.

Well doesn’t everyone just feel welcome on these forums.

btw tree, i think you mentioned you would be lurking on these forums through thick walls until it dies. linens n things, circuit city, give it 1 more year and it will be mopar forums as well.

Anyway, where’s starblaster?

Read full topic

item.title: Starblaster100
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

PaulT you might have something known as HPPD. I’m not sure if you have heard of it but here is a wiki page on it.

en.wikipedia.org

Hallucinogen persisting perception disorder

Hallucinogen persisting perception disorder (HPPD) is a disorder in which a person has flashbacks of visual hallucinations or distortions experienced during a previous hallucinogenic drug experience, sometimes with the same feelings experienced before, which cause distress or impairment in work or everyday life. The flashbacks may be continuous or just occasional. HPPD is a DSM-5 diagnosis with diagnostic code 292.89 (F16.983). For the diagnosis to be made, other psychological, psychiatric, or...

[quote=“Taios, post:67, topic:229392”][quote author=Ron link=topic=301774.msg2580493#msg2580493 date=1229232429]
Offtopic (as if everything in threads is actually on topic) I disagree Pwnd. One of my childhood friends, he’s 27 now, was heavily into drugs. When he was 22 him and some of his buddies bought a vial of acid. They dipped cookies into the vial without measuring the amount they put in and he had a bad trip on a lot of acid. He became a paranoid schizophrenic and was in jail and a mental institution since.

And they also did a test on an elephant by giving it about 1000 tabs of acid (or maybe it was 10 milligrams, I forget) and it died… sooooooooooo lol idk i think anything that you take too much of, can kill you.
[/quote]

Yea but thats not overdosing…[/quote]
If I see any bad repercussions from anything, I would call it an overdose of that something because I believe if I did that something less, the outcome would have been different. But those are only the bad times such as the example I mentioned with my neighbor.

[quote=“Ollie, post:69, topic:229392”]yet another topic on drugs

“i have taken more than you”

“my mate took even more then you”

fuck off and grow up[/quote]
I was talking about an elephant, not my repertoire of drugs consumed.

[quote=“Ollie, post:71, topic:229392”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=301774.msg2593856#msg2593856 date=1229901096]
I didn’t see anyone say that, except Ron
[/quote]

thats who i was aiming it at :)[/quote]
Interesting. I know what type of person you are now.

@Pwnd and everyone else. The one belief which seems logical is the Buddhist philosophy of moderation.

Read full topic

item.title: Starblaster100
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:62, topic:229392”]And they also did a test on an elephant by giving it about 1000 tabs of acid (or maybe it was 10 milligrams, I forget) and it died… sooooooooooo lol idk i think anything that you take too much of, can kill you.[/quote]Ofc anything you take too much of can kill you, however, you need a fucking lot of acid, in comparison to a normal dose, to kill you.

Your friend just had a bad trip and that’s why he’s fucked up. Bad trip != OD.

Read full topic

item.title: Starblaster100
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:59, topic:229392”]Or on acid. Best. Drug. Ever.

@tree, you speak of starblaster as if you were his ex. Why are you so critical of him?[/quote]

Because being a staff member under his control was a horrible experience. He was somebody who only wished for power and cared little about community progression. He was one of the only individuals who was capable of wiping someone completely from the scene.

@ People who claim i’m in it for the power - I was. I haven’t asked for promotions of any sort for a long while. I have looked after the community behind thick walls and will continue to do so until it dies.

Read full topic

item.title: Starblaster100
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

However, thats not an OD.

Weed induces panic attacks for me now that last way longer than the high, but that’s not an OD.

Read full topic

item.title: Starblaster100
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

You can't OD on acid, however. If you find enough acid to OD on it, you would probably die rich or die stupid.

I really did weird things to my brain by dropping lots of acid. I see trails all the time and I often have several full blown flashbacks a day. Yet, acid has helped me get in touch with myself and think more clearly, and for that I am thankful. On the other hand, I would recommend caution in dosing, and don’t mix acid with shrooms unless you know what’s down with what’s up.

Read full topic

item.title: Starblaster100
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Ron:

And they also did a test on an elephant by giving it about 1000 tabs of acid (or maybe it was 10 milligrams, I forget) and it died… sooooooooooo lol idk i think anything that you take too much of, can kill you.

LD50 of LSD is between 200 µg/kg and 1 mg/kg of body weight…
Also, it’s disputed whether the elephant died from the LSD or not.

Read full topic
